import React from 'react'; import { FiUsers, FiCheckCircle, FiClock, FiMapPin, FiDownload } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; const DashboardStats = ({ stats }) => { if (!stats) { return (

Loading statistics...

); } const getAadhaarStats = () => { const statsMap = {}; stats.aadhaarStats?.forEach(item => { statsMap[item._id] = item.count; }); return statsMap; }; const aadhaarStats = getAadhaarStats(); return (
{/* Stats Cards */}
Total Volunteers
{stats.totalVolunteers || 0}
Complete Profiles
{stats.completeProfiles || 0}
Incomplete Profiles
{stats.incompleteProfiles || 0}
With Location
{stats.totalVolunteers - (stats.incompleteProfiles || 0)}
{/* Aadhaar Status Breakdown */}

Aadhaar Status Breakdown

Have Aadhaar

{aadhaarStats.yes || 0}

No Aadhaar

{aadhaarStats.no || 0}

Unknown

{aadhaarStats.unknown || 0}

{/* Recent Submissions */}

Recent Submissions

View all →
{stats.recentSubmissions && stats.recentSubmissions.length > 0 ? (
{stats.recentSubmissions.map((submission, index) => (

{submission.userId?.email || 'Unknown'}

Submitted {submission.submittedAt ? format(new Date(submission.submittedAt), 'MMM dd, yyyy') : 'Recently'}

Complete
))}
) : (

No recent submissions

New volunteer submissions will appear here.

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

View All Volunteers

Manage volunteer profiles

Export Data

Download volunteer data as CSV
); }; export default DashboardStats;
